name: AbstractMemoryAnalytics
desc:
A convenience base class for MemoryAnalytics implementations that provides
derived metrics commonly needed by diagnostics, dashboards, and monitoring
subsystems.

name: getAverageMemoryInMegaByteString
desc: Returns the average memory usage as a formatted string in megabytes.

name: getCurrentMemoryInMegaByteString
desc: Returns the current memory usage as a formatted string in megabytes.

name: getMaximumDelta
desc:
Returns the difference between the current memory usage and the
maximum recorded memory value.

name: getMaximumDeltaString
desc: Returns the maximum delta as a formatted string in megabytes.

name: getMaximumMemoryInMegaByteString
desc: Returns the maximum memory usage as a formatted string in megabytes.

name: getMinimumDelta
desc:
Returns the difference between the current memory usage and the
minimum recorded memory value.

name: getMinimumDeltaString
desc: Returns the minimum delta as a formatted string in megabytes.

name: getMinimumMemoryInMegaByteString
desc: Returns the minimum memory usage as a formatted string in megabytes.

name: getRange
desc:
Returns the total memory amplitude (range) recorded within the
analytics window.

name: getRangeString
desc: Returns the range as a formatted string in megabytes.

name: toJson
desc: Converts this object into a JSON-compatible map.

name: AbstractMemoryReading
desc:
A base implementation of MemoryReading that provides common
utilities for representing memory usage.

name: getMemoryInMegaByteString
desc: Returns the memory usage as a formatted string in megabytes.

name: toJson
desc: Converts this object into a JSON-compatible map.

name: AbstractMonitoringService
desc: Provides a full-featured, periodic memory-monitoring service with support for:

name: createKey
desc: Creates a unified, stable key for performance tracking entries.

name: getAnalyticsInterval
desc:
Returns the time window over which aggregated memory analytics
(min/max/avg) should be computed.

name: getInitWindowAnalysisEnd
desc:
Returns the duration representing the end of the “initial window”
memory analysis phase.

name: getInitWindowAnalysisStart
desc:
Returns the duration representing the start of the “initial window”
memory analysis phase.

name: getInterval
desc: Returns the interval at which memory usage should be captured.

name: getLocation
desc:
Resolves a human-readable, fully-qualified location string for the
given Source, representing where a monitored element originates.

name: getLogger
desc: Returns the logger used for emitting monitoring diagnostics.

name: getMemoryAnalytics
desc:
Returns computed MemoryAnalytics for the given optional duration
window.

name: getMemoryHistory
desc: Returns the full list of collected MemoryReading snapshots.

name: getMemoryReadingStream
desc:
Returns a stream of live MemoryReading events, emitted as the system
captures memory snapshots over time.

name: getReport
desc:
Generates and returns a comprehensive monitoring snapshot encapsulated
in a MonitoringReport.

name: getStartupTracker
desc: Returns a startup tracker instance, if available.

name: isRunning
desc: Check whether this component is currently running.

name: start
desc: A common interface defining methods for start/stop lifecycle control.

name: stop
desc: Stop this component, typically in a synchronous fashion.

name: AbstractPerformance
desc:
Base implementation of Performance providing common functionality
and utility methods for concrete performance tracking objects.

name: freeze
desc: Returns a read-only frozen snapshot of this performance instance.

name: toJson
desc: Converts this object into a JSON-compatible map.

name: ConfigurablePerformance
desc:
A mutable implementation of Performance, intended for constructing,
editing, testing, or manually instrumenting performance data.

name: ConfigurablePerformance.new
desc:
A mutable implementation of Performance, intended for constructing,
editing, testing, or manually instrumenting performance data.

name: addErrorCount
desc: Adds or increments a count for a specific error message.

name: addErrorTypeCount
desc: Adds or increments a count for a specific error type.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: getEndTime
desc:
Returns the timestamp when execution ended, or the most recent
recorded checkpoint if the operation is still running.

name: getErrorCounts
desc: Returns a map of specific error message/instance → count.

name: getErrorTypeCounts
desc:
Returns a map of error type → count representing how many errors
of each category occurred during execution.

name: getIpAddress
desc: Returns the client or request IP address, if available.

name: getLocation
desc: Gets the location of the performing object.

name: getMemoryAnalytics
desc: Returns the MemoryAnalytics captured during the execution period.

name: getName
desc: Returns the name of the method, function, or class being tracked.

name: getRunPeriod
desc: Returns the total duration of the tracked execution.

name: getStartTime
desc: Returns the timestamp when execution started.

name: isRunning
desc: Returns whether the tracked execution is still running.

name: setEndTime
desc: Updates the end time of the operation and marks it as not running.

name: setIpAddress
desc: Sets or updates the IP address associated with the operation.

name: setIsRunning
desc: Updates whether the operation is currently running.

name: setMemoryAnalytics
desc: Replaces the internal memory analytics with the provided instance.

name: setStartTime
desc: Updates the start time of the operation.

name: setUptime
desc: Updates the duration of the operation.

name: DefaultMemoryAnalytics
desc:
A concrete implementation of AbstractMemoryAnalytics that provides
computed memory metrics over a defined observation window.

name: DefaultMemoryAnalytics.new
desc:
A concrete implementation of AbstractMemoryAnalytics that provides
computed memory metrics over a defined observation window.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: getAverageMemoryInMegaByte
desc:
Computes and returns the average memory usage (in megabytes)
across all MemoryReading snapshots in the analytics window.

name: getCurrentMemoryInMegaByte
desc: Returns the most recently recorded memory usage (in megabytes).

name: getMaximumMemoryInMegaByte
desc:
Returns the highest recorded memory usage (in megabytes) observed
during the analytics time window.

name: getMinimumMemoryInMegaByte
desc:
Returns the lowest recorded memory usage (in megabytes) within
the analytics time window.

name: getReadings
desc:
Returns the underlying list of MemoryReading snapshots that
were used to compute all aggregated metrics.

name: getTimeWindow
desc: Returns the total time span represented by this analytic view.

name: DefaultMemoryReading
desc:
A concrete implementation of AbstractMemoryReading representing
a single memory snapshot of the application at a given point in time.

name: DefaultMemoryReading.new
desc: Creates a new DefaultMemoryReading.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: getCreatedAt
desc: Timestamp representing when this memory reading snapshot was created.

name: getMemoryInMegaByte
desc:
Returns the amount of memory used by the target process or subsystem,
expressed in megabytes as a JetLeaf Double.

name: getUptime
desc: Returns the system or process uptime at the moment this reading was taken.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: DefaultMonitoringReport
desc:
Default implementation of MonitoringReport that aggregates
system-level, memory-level, and application-level runtime data.

name: DefaultMonitoringReport.new
desc:
Creates an immutable monitoring report with the supplied process
information, start time, memory analytics, memory history, and
uptime.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: getAppStartTime
desc: Returns the exact startup time of the application.

name: getMemoryAnalytics
desc:
Returns the computed MemoryAnalytics instance derived from
getMemoryHistory.

name: getMemoryHistory
desc: Returns the chronological list of collected MemoryReading objects.

name: getProcessInformation
desc:
Returns a ProcessInformation snapshot describing the environment in which
the app is running.

name: getTotalUptime
desc: Returns the total elapsed time since getAppStartTime.

name: toJson
desc: Converts this object into a JSON-compatible map.

name: DefaultMonitoringService
desc: A concrete implementation of MonitoringService that provides:

name: ANALYTICS_REQUEST_INTERVAL_PROPERTY_NAME
desc:
Property name used to configure the analytics window duration (in milliseconds)
used by getMemoryAnalytics.

name: CLASS
desc:
Reflective representation of this class used for JetLeaf metadata,
construction, and type-resolution utilities.

name: DefaultMonitoringService.new
desc: A concrete implementation of MonitoringService that provides:

name: INIT_WINDOW_ANALYSIS_END_PROPERTY_NAME
desc:
Property name defining the end (in minutes) of the initial-window
memory-baseline analysis.

name: INIT_WINDOW_ANALYSIS_START_PROPERTY_NAME
desc:
Property name defining the start (in minutes) of the initial-window
memory-baseline analysis.

name: POD_NAME
desc: Default pod name under which this monitoring service instance is registered.

name: REQUEST_INTERVAL_PROPERTY_NAME
desc: Property name used to configure the memory-sampling interval (in milliseconds).

name: configure
desc: Configure the module with the given ApplicationContext.

name: create
desc: Creates a ConfigurablePerformance for the given monitor annotation and source.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: getAnalyticsInterval
desc:
Returns the time window over which aggregated memory analytics
(min/max/avg) should be computed.

name: getCreated
desc:
Retrieves an existing ConfigurablePerformance for the given
monitor annotation and source.

name: getInitWindowAnalysisEnd
desc:
Returns the duration representing the end of the “initial window”
memory analysis phase.

name: getInitWindowAnalysisStart
desc:
Returns the duration representing the start of the “initial window”
memory analysis phase.

name: getInterval
desc: Returns the interval at which memory usage should be captured.

name: getLogger
desc: Returns the logger used for emitting monitoring diagnostics.

name: getPerformance
desc:
Returns a tracked Performance record for the given executable name,
or null if no performance data exists for that identifier.

name: getPerformances
desc:
Returns a list of all recorded Performance snapshots currently
maintained by the monitoring subsystem.

name: getStartupTracker
desc: Returns a startup tracker instance, if available.

name: onApplicationEvent
desc: Handle an application event of type E.

name: setEnvironment
desc: Sets the Environment that this component runs in.

name: supportsEventOf
desc: Returns true if the listener supports the given event.

name: updatePerformance
desc:
Updates or persists the given performance instance after it has been
modified (e.g., after execution or error recording).

name: DefaultProcessInformation
desc:
Default implementation of ProcessInformation that provides
metadata about the current running Dart process and the underlying
operating system.

name: DefaultProcessInformation.new
desc:
Creates a new DefaultProcessInformation using the supplied RSS
values and version string.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: getCurrentResidentSetSizeMemory
desc: Returns the current resident set size (RSS) of the process in megabytes.

name: getDartVersion
desc: Returns the version of Dart currently running this process.

name: getFreedMemory
desc:
Returns the amount of memory that has been freed or reclaimed by the
process, reported in megabytes.

name: getLocalHostName
desc: Returns the local machine’s host name.

name: getLocaleName
desc: Returns the locale name currently in use by the process.

name: getMaxResidentSetSizeMemory
desc:
Returns the maximum resident set size observed since process start,
reported in megabytes.

name: getNumberOfProcessors
desc: Returns the number of logical CPU processors available to the process.

name: getOperatingSystem
desc:
Returns the name of the operating system, such as "linux", "macos",
or "windows".

name: getOperatingSystemVersion
desc: Returns the OS version string as reported by the underlying platform.

name: toJson
desc: Converts this object into a JSON-compatible map.

name: InstancePerformanceTracker
desc: Tracks the performance of JetLeaf pod instances during their lifecycle.

name: populateValues
desc: Performs additional value population after standard property population.

name: processAfterDestruction
desc: Processes the pod after all destruction callbacks have completed.

name: processAfterInstantiation
desc: Processes the pod immediately after instantiation but before property population.

name: processBeforeDestruction
desc: Processes the pod before any destruction callbacks are invoked.

name: processBeforeInstantiation
desc: Intercepts pod instantiation before the default instantiation process begins.

name: processPropertyValues
desc: Transforms property values before they are applied to the pod.

name: requiresDestruction
desc: Determines whether the pod requires destruction processing by this processor.

name: MemoryAnalytics
desc:
Represents a computed analytical view over a collection of
MemoryReading snapshots taken during a defined observation window.

name: getAverageMemoryInMegaByte
desc:
Computes and returns the average memory usage (in megabytes)
across all MemoryReading snapshots in the analytics window.

name: getCurrentMemoryInMegaByte
desc: Returns the most recently recorded memory usage (in megabytes).

name: getMaximumMemoryInMegaByte
desc:
Returns the highest recorded memory usage (in megabytes) observed
during the analytics time window.

name: getMinimumMemoryInMegaByte
desc:
Returns the lowest recorded memory usage (in megabytes) within
the analytics time window.

name: getReadings
desc:
Returns the underlying list of MemoryReading snapshots that
were used to compute all aggregated metrics.

name: getTimeWindow
desc: Returns the total time span represented by this analytic view.

name: MemoryReading
desc:
Represents a snapshot of runtime memory consumption and uptime
for a JetLeaf-managed process or subsystem.

name: getCreatedAt
desc: Timestamp representing when this memory reading snapshot was created.

name: getMemoryInMegaByte
desc:
Returns the amount of memory used by the target process or subsystem,
expressed in megabytes as a JetLeaf Double.

name: getUptime
desc: Returns the system or process uptime at the moment this reading was taken.

name: MethodPerformanceTracker
desc: Tracks the execution performance of methods annotated with Monitor.

name: afterInvocation
desc: Invoked after the method execution completes, whether it succeeded or failed.

name: afterThrowing
desc: Executed when a target method throws an exception.

name: beforeInvocation
desc: Executed immediately before the target method invocation.

name: canIntercept
desc: Determines whether this interceptor can intercept the specified method.

name: create
desc: Creates a ConfigurablePerformance for the given monitor annotation and source.

name: getCreated
desc:
Retrieves an existing ConfigurablePerformance for the given
monitor annotation and source.

name: updatePerformance
desc:
Updates or persists the given performance instance after it has been
modified (e.g., after execution or error recording).

name: Monitor
desc:
Annotation used to enable performance monitoring for a class or method
within the JetLeaf runtime.

name: Monitor.new
desc: Creates a new Monitor annotation.

name: annotationType
desc: Returns the annotation _type of this annotation.

name: name
desc:
Optional human-readable or dashboard-friendly identifier for the monitored
class or method.

name: MonitoringReport
desc:
Represents a full, structured snapshot of the application's runtime health,
combining process-level metadata, memory analytics, and historical readings.

name: getAppStartTime
desc: Returns the exact startup time of the application.

name: getMemoryAnalytics
desc:
Returns the computed MemoryAnalytics instance derived from
getMemoryHistory.

name: getMemoryHistory
desc: Returns the chronological list of collected MemoryReading objects.

name: getProcessInformation
desc:
Returns a ProcessInformation snapshot describing the environment in which
the app is running.

name: getTotalUptime
desc: Returns the total elapsed time since getAppStartTime.

name: MonitoringService
desc:
Provides runtime observability for memory usage, performance tracking,
and historical diagnostic data within a JetLeaf application.

name: getMemoryAnalytics
desc:
Returns computed MemoryAnalytics for the given optional duration
window.

name: getMemoryHistory
desc: Returns the full list of collected MemoryReading snapshots.

name: getMemoryReadingStream
desc:
Returns a stream of live MemoryReading events, emitted as the system
captures memory snapshots over time.

name: getPerformance
desc:
Returns a tracked Performance record for the given executable name,
or null if no performance data exists for that identifier.

name: getPerformances
desc:
Returns a list of all recorded Performance snapshots currently
maintained by the monitoring subsystem.

name: getReport
desc:
Generates and returns a comprehensive monitoring snapshot encapsulated
in a MonitoringReport.

name: Performance
desc:
Represents a single tracked execution event—such as a method call
or class instantiation—and provides detailed performance, timing,
memory, and error metrics associated with that execution.

name: getEndTime
desc:
Returns the timestamp when execution ended, or the most recent
recorded checkpoint if the operation is still running.

name: getErrorCounts
desc: Returns a map of specific error message/instance → count.

name: getErrorTypeCounts
desc:
Returns a map of error type → count representing how many errors
of each category occurred during execution.

name: getIpAddress
desc: Returns the client or request IP address, if available.

name: getLocation
desc: Gets the location of the performing object.

name: getMemoryAnalytics
desc: Returns the MemoryAnalytics captured during the execution period.

name: getName
desc: Returns the name of the method, function, or class being tracked.

name: getRunPeriod
desc: Returns the total duration of the tracked execution.

name: getStartTime
desc: Returns the timestamp when execution started.

name: isRunning
desc: Returns whether the tracked execution is still running.

name: ProcessInformation
desc:
Provides an abstraction for retrieving detailed runtime and operating-system–
level information about the current Dart process.

name: getCurrentResidentSetSizeMemory
desc: Returns the current resident set size (RSS) of the process in megabytes.

name: getDartVersion
desc: Returns the version of Dart currently running this process.

name: getFreedMemory
desc:
Returns the amount of memory that has been freed or reclaimed by the
process, reported in megabytes.

name: getLocalHostName
desc: Returns the local machine’s host name.

name: getLocaleName
desc: Returns the locale name currently in use by the process.

name: getMaxResidentSetSizeMemory
desc:
Returns the maximum resident set size observed since process start,
reported in megabytes.

name: getNumberOfProcessors
desc: Returns the number of logical CPU processors available to the process.

name: getOperatingSystem
desc:
Returns the name of the operating system, such as "linux", "macos",
or "windows".

name: getOperatingSystemVersion
desc: Returns the OS version string as reported by the underlying platform.
